item.title: Autism
item.description: I have autism. I’m high-functioning. I went far in education and have had success in employment. That’s a big deal given the depressing statistics. In a sense, I’m outing myself online. In a cliched autistic move, I’m going to list things which make me a bit different from the “average person”, should such a person exist. Partly, this is to get my own thoughts straight about this. I have only really known for a small fraction of my life and though family and friends think it’s obvious (in hindsight) it’s hard for me to accept that I have what is essentially a disability.
